definitions.definition: An increase in the size of an organ or tissue due to the enlargement of its individual cells .

subdefinitions.definition: Increase in muscle size through increased size of individual muscle cells ; a result of weightlifting , and other exercise . It differs from muscle hyperplasia, which is the formation of new muscle cells.

main_definition: ( countable , medicine ) An increase in the size of an organ or tissue due to the enlargement of its individual cells .
